PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-10842015-07-16,  PS,  ,  , 
ActWitness Protection Program Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Schedule to the Witness Protection Program Act (Alberta Witness Security Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE WITNESS PROTECTION PROGRAM ACT (ALBERTA WITNESS SECURITY PROGRAM) in order to (1) facilitate timely access to federal documents (e.g., passports, social insurance numbers, status cards, etc.) that are required for a secure identity change to better protect witnesses admitted into Alberta’s witness protection program; and (2) ensure information about Alberta’s program, its witnesses and its administrators is protected by the non-disclosure provisions of the Witness Protection Program Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0194 Publication Date: 2015-07-29
AttachmentsAttachment
